page.title: 01Elton Aston & Burrington
page.content: The area comprises mainly of intensively cultivated grassland with dairy and sheep farming together with some arable farming. The other main use of land is for forestry with comercial growth of coniferous trees. There is a small estate with shooting rights. The majority of people work on the land although a few work in the local towns of Ludlow and Leaminster. A very small number work overseas. There are a number of people who have retired to the area. There is no public transport system nor are there any local amenities which means that all families must have their own transport.
